commit message: Only resumes on audiofocus change when playstate was STARTED at audiofocus loss
Fixed updatebookasync to really run in background
Starts service in an own thread
More performance improvements due to async handling
Only inits spinner if there are more than 1 media to play
Correctly reinits values in onSizeChanged to prevent wrong manual-crop borders
Executes book-adding on thread pool executor so book will be added immediately
Allow swap of book to last (empty) position
Added confirmation dialog before deleting a book
Changed notification fonts to system settings
Made play-pause icon in notification one size bigger
Added album art on lockscreen for Lollipop
